description.displayText: Rena's communication could have been much better, after two interviews (phone then in person) she never stated her policy around only approving background checks for full time services with 6-12mo signed contract. I learned about her policy only after I contacted her to see if she received a background check request( as several days had gone by and I still hadn't received the req.) I was very clear in my initial messages on care.com and during our two conversations about the need for 3-4 days a week. I'm extremely busy and it felt like she didn't value my time, I could have saved a lot of time if she would have stated her policy for a signed contact/ full time work to receive a background.

description.displayText: Rena was fantastic with my 1-year-old! She played with her the whole time, read to her, and made sure she was happy while I worked. My baby didn't even want her to leave.... She kept her reaching up to give Rena hugs! I will definitely rehire Rena, and would recommend her to anyone without any reservations whatsoever.

She kept her reaching up to give Rena hugs! I will definitely rehire Rena, and would recommend her to anyone without any reservations whatsoever.

description.displayText: Rena is also an exceptional educator. She worked for my academic support/tutoring company on a seasonal basis for over 5 years. Rena is caring and very serious about the work that she does. She will unquestionably be an asset.
